country.country_description: Arvio is a small planet located in a distant solar system. It is populated by a peaceful, technologically advanced species called the Arvians.
country.people_description: The Arvians are a friendly people who have a strong sense of community and are very welcoming to outsiders.
country.language_description: Arvian is the official language of Arvio. It is a highly complex language that has been influenced by many other languages over its long history.
